description:
||Course last updated on June 22nd, 2016||

Offering this incredible course for $25 until June 27th, 2016 (a $50 value)!!

Our instructor cares about your success. Connect directly with Colton Shuell:

SNAP CHAT- coltonshuell

Facebook- Colton Shuell or type in "make a million dollars with Colton Shuell" and press search!

We just started the this great Facebook group! It's filling up! But, you can still interact 1-on-1 with Colton Shuell. Check him out!

--------Now, on to the actual course info!--------

Have you ever dreamed of making a million dollars on Amazon?? The time is NOW. Here is your chance. You can really do this!

THERE IS A REASON WHY OUR COURSE HAS BECOME SUCCESSFUL OVERNIGHT:

-QUALITY, QUALITY, QUALITY!

-FUN & ENGAGING LECTURES! (Trust us, we dislike editing boring videos as much as you dislike watching them!)

-WE ALWAYS UPDATE OUR COURSE WITH THE LATEST AMAZON TWEAKS AND CHANGES!

***A BIG THANKS GOES OUT TO ALL OF THE INCREDIBLE ENTREPRENEURS ALREADY ENROLLED IN OUR COURSE. We have a few that are on the path to success...will you be one of them?***

Our instructor, Colton Shuell has been selling on Amazon and Ebay since 1998. He started on a pull-out couch in a studio apartment with his wife after college. Now he is physically saddened if he makes less than a million in profit per year. 

We know what you're thinking, "There is NO WAY I could make a million dollars on Amazon...." STOP RIGHT THERE! This is absolutely FALSE. In fact, Colton has trained several others how to make an incredible income online. Now, using this streamlined Udemy platform, he has poured all of his knowledge into a series of lessons that will change hundreds of lives for the better. 

This course is all about the world of Amazon and how YOU can become a part of it. Now is the perfect time for you to make that income you have always wanted. Ever wanted to be your own boss? Make your own schedule? Is one of your goals to make more money in 2016?

If you answered "yes" to any of these questions, keep reading.

We have the secret recipe for increasing your income while simultaneously giving you more free time to do what YOU want to do. Imagine what you could do with an extra $1,000 or $10,000 a month. 

Our ingredients are simple, our method is proven. We break it all down step-by-step. We've done the research. We've created our own Amazon store. We've made millions. We have become Amazon EXPERTS. Now, we want to share everything we have learned with other smart entrepreneurs like you!.

This is NOT a get rich scheme. This is an outlined step-by-step approach to building a sustainable business. 

You will be taught how to buy your own products overseas, brand them (aka private label) and make them sell like hot cakes on Amazon.

We will get to the points clearly and concisely, we won't waste your time. And look, don't be fooled by other more expensive courses that drag on for hours and hours, because they will only put you to sleep or fill your head with useless information. It's a fact, we have the most engaging and beneficial lessons out there. Check it out for yourself! 

Not sure what products to buy and sell on Amazon - no problem.  We are here to teach you what to do and point you in the right direction for massive profits. 

Another awesome aspect of this course is that we will be there to answer any of your questions in a super timely manner. We won't leave you behind, because we want to see you succeed. We will be your personal coach as you jump from step-to-step on your entrepreneurial journey. 

What you will learn:

1. How to Private label products for overseas and sell on Amazon

2. How to negotiate with overseas suppliers

3. The building blocks of creating a sustainable business

4. How to get the lowest prices on products

5. EXACTLY how Colton sources his Amazon products 

6. The EXACT companies Colton uses to get his products to the USA

7. A step-by-step guide on how to improve your ranking on Amazon

A few things you'll need:

1. Internet access

2. A laptop, tablet or computer

3. An entrepreneurial spirit

What perks do you get from us?:

1. An instructor who truly wants you to succeed and will answer any questions you may have on your journey to make a million dollars. Send us a message! We want to know what you're up to! 

2. A step-by-step guide to success on Amazon with personalized advice

3. A 30-day money back guarantee. In the rare case that you feel the course has been completely useless or isn't for you, let us know and we will personally refund you. You have nothing to lose and EVERYTHING to gain.

If you are still reading, you rock. Our course is top quality and if you follow our recipe, you will be able to accomplish your financial goals. When you do, we want to hear all about it. 

Let's get going! Click on the “take this course" link at the top of this page NOW! Don't let another second go by, it's time to take action. 

We won't leave you behind.
title: Amazon - Private Label Products - FBA - Make a Million $$
